```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE)
pacman::p_load(rio, here, dplyr,tidyverse,lubridate, ggplot2,viridis, naniar)
```

```{r}
var_2019 <- import(here("data","var_2019.xlsx")) %>% 
mutate(across(starts_with(c("self_reported", "grades", "school_descriptor")), as.numeric))

var_2021 <- import(here("data","var_2021.xlsx"))%>% 
mutate(across(starts_with(c("self_reported", "grades", "school_descriptor")), as.numeric))
var_2022 <- import(here("data","var_2022.xlsx"))%>% 
mutate(across(starts_with(c("self_reported", "grades", "leaps", "school_descriptor", "leadership", "teaching")), as.numeric))

var_2023 <- import(here("data","var_2023.xlsx")) %>% 
  mutate(across(starts_with(c("self_reported", "grades","leaps", "school_descriptor","leadership", "teaching")), as.numeric),
         across(20:29, ~./100))

```

```{r}
#check list:  id, city, state, district, school_descriptor, locale pk-12 grade, race, frpl, ell, swd, sws, #enrollment, nces_id, leaps_rank, grades, panel year, leadership & teaching diversity, leader1 race & gender

var <- bind_rows(var_2019, var_2021, var_2022, var_2023) %>% 
  select(school_id, panel_year, everything())
gg_miss_var(var)

```
Check for school_descriptor in 2019
```{r}
var %>% 
  filter(panel_year == 2019) %>% 
  count(school_descriptor_alt2019) %>% 
  mutate(pct = n / sum(n))
var %>% 
  filter(panel_year == 2019) %>% 
  count(school_descriptor) %>% 
  mutate(pct = n / sum(n))
  
```
